about.eDonishDesc: - лоиҳаи электронӣ гардонидани таҳсилоти мактабии шаҳри Душанбе (Тоҷикистон)
about.msu: Филиали Донишгиҳи давлатии Москав дар ш. Душанбе
about.successKeyDesc: "Муваффақиятро аксар вақт онҳое ба даст меоранд, ки ногузирии мағлубиятро гумон намекунанд."

services.buildUIInteraction: Build complex UI interactions that communicate with the server.
services.formFrontDesign: Form the front-end design of a website by applying information that affects content.
services.styleOfSite: Style, flexibility and interactivity of a site.
services.workOnLargeProjects: Work with other developers on larger projects.
services.designEthBasedSC: Constructing & designing Ethereum-based smart contracts within the Ethereum Virtual Platform and Blockchain platforms.
services.generateChainOfTransaction: Implement business logic and generate a chain of transaction records in the blockchain system.
services.createDapp: Creating decentralized applications (DAPP) and interaction among users and applications.

portfolio.airbnb: Airbnb (A small project with card components)

testimonials.bobojonTuraevJob: HR Manager, UX/UI Designer at Vatan ICT
testimonials.bobojonTuraevReview: While working with Muhammad, I noticed in him many good qualities of a successful worker. He is never late, always arrives on time. Whatever task he is given, he completes ahead of schedule. Never argues, always busy with business. And when support is needed, he is the first to lend a helping hand.
testimonials.lolaAminjanovaReview: Emotionally stable friend with the following useful qualities: perseverance, hard working, efficiency and responsibility.
testimonials.nurulloSulaymonovJob: Founder of SoftClub IT Center, Middle Backend Developer
testimonials.nurulloSulaymonovReview: I know Muhammadrasul about a year. First time when he came to softclub he didn't know anything about programming. Gradually with a great passion he continued studying С++, HTML, git, JavaScript and React. We are amazed with such commitment and process. I am sure Muhammadrasul can overcome any difficulties in programming as well as any aspect of life.
